name: moneymoney-sankey
description: An extension for the great MoneyMoney app to export an interactive HTML Sankey Chart based on the transaction categories
author: Christoph Massmann <chris@dev-investor.de>

scripts.build: npm-run-all build:* && mkdir -p $npm_package_config_outputDir && cp src/sankey.lua $npm_package_config_outputDir/SankeyChart.lua && cp src/$npm_package_config_templateFile $npm_package_config_outputDir && INLINE_CSS=`npm run build:css --silent` INLINE_JS=`npm run build:js --silent` node ./build.mjs
scripts.test:validate:compile: mkdir -p tmp && lua ./src/sankey_test.lua > tmp/index.html && html-validate tmp/index.html
